text1:
A sort of beginning for the Gensoukyou Manufacture Fleet, the Kaiten class is equipped powerful energy system and weapon slots when compared to typical frigate. It integrates a wide range tactical support system based on technological application of spiritual energy, giving it the ability to take damage for other ships and making it a common sight in large-scale fleet engagement.

As an important early technological cooperation between the technology within the boundaries and outside, the Kaiten class appears to be a conservative design based on the expansion era assault design philosophy of a highly manueverable  ship equipped with energy weapon combined with the installation of spirtual energy technology from within the boundary as a modular tactical system. While the design seems simple its very versatile and partical. It largely mitigated the limited ability for Expansion Era designs to adjust to a large scale combat. Various type of testing and research on it have paved the groundwork for the subsequent engineering of more unique doctrines in Gensoukyou Manufacture fleet.

Notably, although its early prototype model were not fitted with Drone systems, under the influences by some important people within the inner side of boundaries has led to all variants of her class in current era to be fitted with auxiliary drones known as "Kedama". Nowadays its common to see this class with its drones in festival of all place instead of combats, dazzling the audience with excellent visual spectacle with Kedama excellent atmospheric manuevere and magnificient "danmaku" pattern.

The crew and captain of Kedama class often associated with dedication and self-sacrifice in popular fiction, perhaps following some of the legends and stories from the inner side of boundary.

like all other Gensoukyou Manufacture ships, it seems to be affected by some sort of memetic corruption

A Multi-purpose frigate designed around its medium universal slot, its equipped with flux conduits and small auxiliary weaponries on par wtih expansion era frigate. Often seen in small skirmish due to its simple design easy maintenance, but at times also seen with missile to support and harras enemy in large engagement. Its relatively decent mobility and capability to deploy Active Decoys ensured its survivability.

The Hotaru class was initially a poorly thought of project that underwent several iterations. The project as commenced on the day of Gensoukyou Manufacture revealed themselves in the sector, and designed for low intensity security missions. The project was only saved from the cutting board at the protest of civilian Organization on the inner-side of The Boundaries. Althought the project's fund and technical support was fairly strained compared to typical project thats sponsored by Gensoukyou Manufacture, Thanks to a talented young engineer from the outside and his assistant (and later wife, rumoured to be non-human) from the inner side, the Project was finally completed after many trials and error, and there have been numerous related literary work has been made on this topic since then.

The exact technical details of it also confirm the authenticity of the aforementioned story, Combining the standard combat capability of an expansion era military frigate with logistic efficiency thats comparable to high-grade civillian frigates, and outfitting the ship with a less fancy but versitile active flare system allows the ship to perform quite well for its intended purposes. Its also capable enough to deliver enough firepower to punish those who underestimated this small bug of a ship through its excellent general purpose mount and nimble mobility, which is quite impressive when used in large numbers.

like all other Gensoukyou Manufacture ships, it seems to be affected by some sort of memetic corruption.

Commonly used as the core of a small detachment, its equipped with standardized weapon and energy systems. The ship is light, fast, and powerful with capability to scatter light minefields, making it particularly effective on small to medium scale skirmish.

Designed after the re-appearances of Gensoukyou Manufacture, the design has been rushed through development as a emergency production vessal, by taking reference from several popular frigate from the outside. While retaining most quality of a conventional frigates such as small missiles, the Usagi class is in a sense the true inspiration for the current Gensoukyou Manufacture fleet doctrines. Relying on its versatility to strike provided by its shipsystem and armaments, the frigate is able to take its sustained firepower to a whole new level while maintaing the excellent mobility and decent shielding of expansion era vessals. 

Since the time of constant raid from luddic pathers, the Usagi class has always been active on the frontline. To the point that during early production runs, it is produced nearly as ubiquitously as civilian shuttles. However with the directive of a more diverse fleet. The role of Usagi is now being replaced by more specialized ships. There are still a large number of Usagi class that have gone into civilian usage , or reserved as second-line in roles like Training Ship, just like typical frigates ship in the sector "old soldiers never die".

like all other Gensoukyou Manufacture ships, it seems to be affected by some sort of memetic corruption.

An Expensive and Advanced armed freighter, the Karakasa prioritize mobility when fighting alone engagement and is fitted with relatively less common hybrid weaponries. its relatively high capability has already reached to that of standard military frigates. However due combined factor of its high cost and difficulty in acquisition, it has almost no market in the smuggling scenes.

Nevertheless there is still a place for this excessively-capable design, for surveyor who cannot afford a larger exploration ship, the Karakasa-class are their best caretaker. Thanks to its highly automated subsystem the ship can be easily be operated by small crew. With its sufficient fuel and cargo spaces and its aerodynamic design for atmospheric re-entry making it excellent for planetary exploration and surveillances. With its reasonable armament configuration and support drones, when its properly used are capable enough to repel small pirates forces that are looking for troubles in outskirt of sector, a truely all-purpose ship.

Due to its popularity in exploration organizations thats focuses on exploring the unknown, and making up stories. The Karakasa is illustrated as a Cute Young Girl in popular fiction. Despite seeming to incorporate a lot of the legends from the inner side of the boundaries such as tsukumogami, the outside world's passion for derivative work for this character countinues unhindered. However for some reason there was an urban legends circulating on comm network that suggest the girl is not a fictional character.

like all other Gensoukyou Manufacture ships, it seems to be affected by some sort of memetic corruption

A Fast Carrier with impressive mobility, placing significant emphasis on bomber strike while also posessing a certain degree long range support capability, but without a proper support the ship's weakness in ability to maintain suppression will become obvious. 

Representing the carrier strike doctrine in Gensoukyou Manufacture fleet doctrine, it tries to improve the conventional expansion era strategy of torpedo strike by placing it on an entirely new highly agile platform. Notably, its Advanced Shipsystem "Solitary Egret" can be combined with advanced bombers such as "Amanojyaku" it can deliver payload with great efficiency.

However, despite being widely used as the main striking force, the shipsystem also contributes to pilots survivability. The reputation and word of mouth about the Egret within the lower ranks however are far from the expected positive images, especially in fleets where a higher proportion of inner boundary crew members are present. There are widespread legends particularly suggesting that the "Solitary Egret" can influence luck and other superstitions. The internal affairs department has taken down and giving response on these matters multiple times to "dispel the superstition" but the result seems to have little effect, despite statistical data that indicate low casualty rates for this ship.

like all other Gensoukyou Manufacture ships, it seems to be affected by some sort of memetic corruption.

A Agile, fast, and elegant small carrier with two hangar bays equipped with maintenances facility as well an efficient shields. its capable enough to hold its line at any range while also able to surpress the enemy defensive capability.

Unlike the commonly seen carrier like Heron or Condor, the Margatroid class has a quite elegant streamlined appearance and embellished aerodynamic design. If one were to describe its appearance in human terms, perhaps only the word 'maiden' could perfectly express it all. Conversely, as a combat carrier, the Margatroid class is extremely efficient in its lethality, especially combined with its shipsystem thats use technology derived from the inner-side of boundaries it can interfere and disrupt targets PD weaponry, along with its Unique built-in "Fairy Tales Book" module, allow the ships fighter to shred targets at close range.

Although various signs of detrimentals effect indicate its being caused by the built-in module thats derived from the technology of boundary inner-side toward mentality of the pilots and even the ship commander, surprisingly there is still significant number of crew who are willing to board this type of ship. perhaps because of this, in popular fiction the Margatroid onboard sub-system AI is often potrayed as a young girl who has obsessive devotion to someone to the point of imposing mental disturabnces on them.

like all other Gensoukyou Manufacture ships, it seems to be affected by some sort of memetic corruption.

A great example of small Gensoukyou Manufacture ship, combining excellent mobility with small amount of flexible weaponries and a squadron of drones coupled with its special Fuujin shipsystem to traverse through phase space in short period. Making it a formidable ship to engage all of type of enemy.

Engineered with miniature phase technology, some deviation and improvement from the standard expansion-era assault doctrine. The Literary class compromises considerably on armor and hull integrity to achieve high speed and mobility which is uncommon for an destroyer. In addition the Literary class relies on its drones that complement its sustained firepower, in accoradnce with Gensoukyou Manufacture's fleet doctrine. Unlike many expansion era ships that are often mocked as  "glass cannons" , the ship's flux cunduit and shield system are capable enough to allow the ship to survive against a stronger enemy. With its shipsystem that essentially guarantees escape route at any time, even less experienced captain can utilized the ship's potential to some degree.

The Literary class was also important to the formation of present Gensoukyou Manufacture's Fleet doctrine. Despite being designed before the re-appearance of Gensoukyou Sector within the sector, the ship's combat report on various engagement demonstrated the potential of the sustained suppressive firepower theory and ability to perform PD task without relying on a large number of small weaponries. Due to this important history and the shi['s relatively simple and clean image of this ship, The ship's silhouette often used as an unnofficial symbol for Gensoukyou Manufacture ships.

In popular fiction, while it does not appear as often as the mysterious and advanced ships that often serve as the main character's personal ship, she still see common apperance. "After all, who doesnt love a pretty cute little Crow?"

like all other Gensoukyou Manufacture ships, it seems to be affected by some sort of memetic corruption

One of the most precious mass-produced destroyers that can be found in the persean sector, the Miko, integrated with the spiritual framework, possesses weapon adaptability surpassing most Gensoukyou-built ships and maintains the faction's well-known high mobility. This atypical design allows it flourish in high-risk engagement. 

First developed as a project to improve the phase skimmer system to be based on spirtual energy within the boundary, its development was largely handled by the inner side of the boundaries after it nearly drove several engineer from outside insane. Despite initial distrust from the outer side, when its final design was completed, almost everyone was shocked by its astonishing performance, and voices of doubt and opposition dissipated.

Unlike the expansion-era ships that adopt cutting edge tech without regard to the quality of crew life, the Miko, although possessing an Bizarre internal structure like most ships engineered by the inner side of the boundaries , it allows most crew members to maintain a relatively normal mental state during operation. However, on the other hand, perhaps due to some mysterious effect of the spiritual framework, members of the Miko class often report witnessing a series of incredible events. The most famous of these is the rumored incident near Blazing Hell in the year 193, where a large asteroid expected to impact the surface and the prototype of the Miko class which was undergoing early testing at the time experienced a resonance phenomenon, causing the asteroid to deviate from the orbit and avoided the impact.

like all other Gensoukyou Manufacture ships, it seems to be affected by some sort of memetic corruption.

Designed to pursue the limits of firepower, the ship is so fragile yet so deadly that it can be considered the Gensoukyou Manufacture version of the Super Mudskipper MK2. 

The inner-side of the boundaries engineered the weapon system and the shipsystem, flux core, hull is made by the outside world, the ship carries distinctive characteristics of a collaborative project between the inner-side and outside world in sector, This destroyer emphasizes striking capabilities. It is why all of its anti-ship configurations ends up quite radical, while the shipsystem, although conventional, always prove quite effective.

However, despite the the best efforts from outside world to install capable shields and flux conduits, due to the excessive budget spent by the inner side of the boundaries on armaments and exterior design, this ship is still prone to dying horribly after running out of missiles in battle. What a poor child...

like all other Gensoukyou Manufacture ships, it seems to be affected by some sort of memetic corruption

A light cruiser design with a relatively bulky size but high agility, featuring an impressive array of energy weapons, cute yet dangerous drones, and highly efficient conventional engines. It holds unique value in missions focused on hunting down small targets.

The Tamashi-class is a peculiar design created through brainstorming by several engineers within the inner side of the boundaries, who don't quite resemble humans, after studying and learning from multiple expansion era designs. The prototype was then fine-tuned by a few young technicians from the outside world. While it overall adheres to the Gensoukyou Manufacture's fleet doctrine of sustained firepower, its primary role still overlaps with conventional expansion era light cruisers: relying on a powerful flux system and maneuverability, coupled with versatile energy weapons, to suppress enemy light vessels. However, when comparing the two, the Tamashi-class's lack of burst damage becomes quite apparent. It often relies on its mobility and flux system for self-preservation when facing true heavy ships rather than being able to launch a counter-attack.

Perhaps due to frequently appearing in the public eye as the flagship of light fleets in resolving small-scale conflicts, the Tamashi, with its clean and simple appearance, enjoys considerable popularity among the general populace. As a result, the Tamashi often secures the top spot in some sketchy popularity polls on comm networks, and there are even rumors suggesting that the Tamashi is highly popular in activities within pirate and pathers.

like all other Gensoukyou Manufacture ships, it seems to be affected by some sort of memetic corruption.

While often assigned to auxiliary and support tasks, the Neru-class is essentially a versatile cruiser, with a flexible weapon array that allows it to play a significant role in both small and large-scale engagement.

As one of the few large ships designed before the re-apperances of Gensoukyou Manufacture, the Neru-class is somewhat of a budgetary miracle. In a scenario where most funds were allocated to economic development and the design of small ships, a design team primarily composed of outsider researchers managed to achieve performance beyond expectations by deriving some of the excavated Domain-era technologies from within the boundaries, despite having somewhat insufficient funding. On the other hand, due to substantial support from individuals and civilian organizations within the boundaries, the development of the Neru-class's ship systems and built-in modules proceeded quite smoothly (although it did cause various degrees of temporary psychological damage to many outsiders participants along the way).

In the days following the re-apperances, the Neru-class has consistently been tasked with supporting light fleets in combating pirates and pathers. Perhaps due to the deterrent power of its ship systems, fear of the Neru-class has now become commonplace in the underworld.

like all other Gensoukyou Manufacture ships, it seems to be affected by some sort of memetic corruption.

Undoubtedly the flagship of the Gensoukyou Manufacture fleet, the Yagokoro-class is a flexible and efficient multipurpose capital ship However, to fully unleash its capabilities, it requires an exceptionally skilled commander.

Although, before the re-appearances of Gensoukyou Manufacture, most of the research and development funds were invested in the development of small ships, the Yagokoro-class, as an emergency plan upon re-exposure, still received sufficient resources to sustain a slow-paced development. It was under these conditions that a significant portion of the ship's structure had already been designed before the re-appearances. After the re-appearances and re-contact, the project naturally received the highest priority and was rapidly put into combat.

From a design perspective, the Yagokoro inherits to some extent the theory of concentrated application of large carriers and carrier-based fighters from the Expansion Era, while absorbing some typical battleship elements. This hybrid design, coupled with advanced support AI from within the barrier and an enormous wide-ranging displacement device known as the "Endless Gallery" makes the Yagokoro a top notch practical design. 

Just like the stories within the boundray suggest, the present-day Yagokoro, like their namesake, mainly undertakes tasks of defense and guarding important objectives. In popular fiction, the commander and AI assistant of the Yagokoro-class are often depicted as wise sages.

like all other Gensoukyou Manufacture ships, it seems to be affected by some sort of memetic corruption.

A typical Gensoukyou Manufacture ship renowned for its frontal firepower and sustained suppression capabilities, the Kiseki-class possesses a formidable resilience and diverse tactical applications that seem to defy its basic parameters, giving it abilities to almost create miracles.

The initial design of the Kiseki-class was nearly unrelated to the outside, as it was originally being steadily developed as a civilian cargo ship for a civilian organization within the boundaries. It was a modular transport vessel designed for rapid shipping tasks, intentionally excluding shields and relying solely on a special ships system called the "Miracle of Winds" for protection. However, with the occurrence of the re-appearances event, official authorities began searching for alternative designs, and due to the exceptional performance of the "Miracle of Winds" system, which replaced shields in the original design, the Kiseki project was swiftly militarized.

Thanks to the earlier modular design, the Kiseki-class could accommodate the most advanced flux systems and corresponding weapon arrays available at the time in Gensoukyou Manufacture. The remaining researchers from within the boundaries once again optimized its power system and outer hull. In the end, this ship, which defied common sense but exuded a unique sense of the mystical, joined the fleet of Gensoukyou Manufacture, continually creating new miracles.

To commemorate this miraculous development process, all Kiseki-class ships have the simplified emblem of the original civilian organization painted in specific locations.

like all other Gensoukyou Manufacture ships, it seems to be affected by some sort of memetic corruption.

An intermediate ship between a battlecruiser and a battleship, the Byakuren-class possesses considerable sustained firepower and relatively good maneuverability for a capital ship, though it currently cannot be considered supercapital.

Representing the cutting-edge of conventional Gensoukyou Manufacture fleet doctrines, the Byakuren-class boasts ample sustained firepower and a relatively flexible equipment arrangement. Its compact hull structure relies primarily on efficient shields and its inherent maneuverability for defense. However, from a logistical perspective, the expensive and challenging-to-maintain Byakuren-class is clearly unsuitable for widespread construction. Not to mention, the Byakuren-class places significant demands on the quality of commanders and crew members. The combination of these factors makes this type of ship relatively rare in the Gensoukyou Manufacture fleet.

Nevertheless, regardless of these challenges, when the Byakuren-class charges through enemy lines with lightning speed and unleashes its firepower at close range, various oppositions become inconsequential. After all, everyone's sage has more important things to do.

like all other Gensoukyou Manufacture ships, it seems to be affected by some sort of memetic corruption.

A high-speed electronic warfare vessel with a certain degree of interferences capability, the Yasuzume demonstrates considerable efficiency in supporting and assisting large capital ships and countering missiles. However, this doesn't mean it cannot participate in skirmish just like conventional ships.

The image of Yasuzume is almost entirely different from the originally envisioned design of a resilient electronic warfare vessel by the Gensoukyou Manufacture. Nevertheless, after numerous modifications and adjustments by the Yasuzume design team, It ultimately achieved the initial requirements in a different form. This was accomplished by significantly reducing conventional armor and extensively using low-cost composite materials, granting Yasuzume unparalleled speed and maneuverability. Multiple redundant systems and automated damage control allow the ship to carry out missions even after the ship has lost its armored protection. The central ECM system, serving as its core, can handle dangerous missiles from a relatively long distance. The resilience of the ship under such design conditions is remarkable.

On the other hand, rumors suggest that the Yasuzume project is accompanied by a peculiar romantic story. Unfortunately, due to the existence of confidentiality regulations and similar constraints, the specific plot details are left to the imagination of the reader.

like all other Gensoukyou Manufacture ships, it seems to be affected by some sort of memetic corruption.

One of the few true support vessels in Gensoukyou Manufacture's designs, a genuine danmaku arsenal.

Although the Kagerou-class was not initially designed as a support ship to carrying a large number of missile weapons, with the modernization process of the Gensoukyou Manufacture fleet, almost all Kagerou-class ships have been retrofitted into their current form. However, despite such drastic modifications, the modern Kagerou-class remains simple and reliable, much like its early models. After all, in this region of space dominated by missiles, the best way to protect allies is to use more missiles to defeat the enemy first...

Their reliable performance has also influenced the portrayal of Kagerou-class crew members in related fiction. They are commonly depicted as loyal and honest, emphasizing camaraderie, a theme that is particularly popular in the creations within Gensoukyou.

like all other Gensoukyou Manufacture ships, it seems to be affected by some sort of memetic corruption.

A highly unusual cruiser design, with its shipsystems and integrated modules significantly enhancing the operational efficiency of space superiority fighters, while also possessing sufficient firepower for direct engagement.

Although ostensibly designed as a cruiser-level solution for fleet anti-air and space control operations in Gensoukyou Manufacture's fleet doctrine, the Hearn-class more commonly serves in anti-ship combat missions during actual combat. The ship's jump system, adapted from the Miko-class's mystical skimmer system, allows it to effortlessly teleport most of its fighter intact directly to the vicinity of enemy ships, causing damage. The Hearn-class itself has direct firepower equivalent to a conventional destroyer with a relatively superior flux system, supporting it in both anti-air and anti-ship combat. All these factors together making the Hearn-class one of the most impressive ship in medium to small-scale engagements.

However, as a ship primarily developed by the inner side of the boundaries, the internal structure and ship systems of the Hearn-class remains characteristically perplexing. Although not surrounded by rumors of designs that disrupt the mental state of crew members like some other designs, statistical data suggests that, despite not causing any truly severe psychological damage to anyone so far, serving on the Hearn-class does heighten an individual's mental sensitivity.

Furthermore, evidence shows that this class of ship seems to be affected by a more complicated memetic corruption. and its nickname, "Boundary Scholar" aptly illustrates this point...

Representing the next generation of ships incorporating Spell Framework design, the Yuugure-class is somewhat rare due to  insufficient emphasis placed on phase ships by Gensoukyou Manufacture, and the lower production output of this new ship type.

While the design was initially guided by the policy of directly adapting the phase ship usage from the Expansion Era, Gensoukyou Manufacture's peculiar application of technology ultimately transformed the ship into something almost entirely different from mainstream phase ships.

As the first ship to integrate the Spell Framework, the Yuugure-class's shipsystems design is quite extraordinary. Thanks to the Spell Frame's ability to allow direct manipulation of spiritual energy and generating it, the comprehensive weapon system known as the Cross of Dark Majesty makes the ship an extremely rare ship with both balanced offensive  and defensive capabilities (though the massive amount of space taken by the weapon inevitably leads to a lack of conventional weaponry). This dual capability significantly enhances the ship's flexiblity, to some extent compensating for the major weakness of phase ships. However, this also contributes to the relatively higher maintenance costs and the peculiar maintenance difficulty, making it somewhat costlier to maintain compared to other phase ships of its class.

like all other Gensoukyou Manufacture ships, it seems to be affected by some sort of memetic corruption.

A destroyer specialized in raids and harassment, the Reisen-class are often at a disadvantage in head on combat. However, for captains who possess both courage and experience, the lingering red phantoms when the shipsystems is activated are a symbol of victory.

Technical collaboration with the Inner Side of the Boundaries has brought new tactical ideas and provided opportunities for further refinement and improvement of old theories. Although designed in the early stage of the development of Gensoukyou Manufacture fleet doctrine, the Reisen-class is undoubtedly the most perfect small craft under expansion era doctrines: the precise teleportation based on Mystical Skimmer solidified the doctrine of "Surprise" into the ship's very hull. Combined with the firepower configuration dominated by energy weapons and the usual high maneuverability, it must be acknowledged that the differences between the Reisen-class is more similar to a Conventional Expansion Era ships than some other Gensoukyou Manufacture designs.

However, on the other hand, from the repeatedly reinforced but still fragile armor and structure to the firepower that is not quite sufficient for head-on combat, the flaws of the old theory are also quite evident in the Reisen-class. Therefore, overall, mastering such a ship still requires more experience and courage.

like all other Gensoukyou Manufacture ships, it seems to be affected by some sort of memetic corruption.

Symbol of history and knowledge, named after an ancient beast of fortune. Hakutaku would often wander the outer sectors to seek every possible sliver of hope.

Unlike usual civilian ships in the sector, the Hakutaku is not designed for transporting military supply or civilian goods. She is designed to discover and pass on knowledge, the most valuable things in this sector. From broken data chip of wrecked ship, technical prototype buried in dust, or hibernating probe hidden in the corner of a system. The Hakutaku's mission is to find all these pre-collapse tech, or even lost basic scientific knowledge, back to the civilized worlds, in hopes of changing the prsent.

In line with these requirements, Hakutaku's cargo holds and fuel tanks are designed more towards self-sustainability and supporting small fleets. Additionally, considering the need for atmospheric exploration and the concerning security situation in the outer rim, Hakutaku is equipped with a flight deck capable of supporting standard fighter craft LPC. However, having integrated so many functional devices, the destroyer-class hull no longer allows for the installation of more self-defense weapons. Therefore, despite having a relatively robust shield protection system, Hakutaku cannot gain an advantage when facing agile and dangerous foes.

For those worlds that were once abundant with life but now faced with civilizational collapse, Hakutaku's appearance often heralds the return of civilization and order.

like all other Gensoukyou Manufacture ships, it seems to be affected by some sort of memetic corruption.

An extremely formidable strike vessal, the Yatagarasu-class has the fantasical design of mounting large energy weapon slots on an escort ship and is equipped with fully adequate flux dissipation grid and reasonably good protection. In a sense, it can be considered a quite powerful escort ship.

After the researchers from the inner-side and outside the boundaries spent quite a long time debating the design of the new generation of escort ships, the final product was the Yatagarasu-class. Its design stitches together conventional passive protection with a Gensoukyou-styled weapon system in a way that doesn't look too bad. However, behind its outstanding performance is the unfortunate fact that the design team was forced to work under extreme conditions. After all, coordinating large weapon slots, the peculiar reactors provided by the Inner Side, and the precise electronic devices that had to be installed to ensure performance, proved to be far more challenging than imagined. However, in actual combat, the Yatagarasu demonstrated the genius engineering of the team.

like all other Gensoukyou Manufacture ships, it seems to be affected by some sort of memetic corruption.

Another peculiar and extreme design emphasizing survivability above all else, this ship boasts advanced shields and a unique flux system design rarely seen in the entire sector. However, the sense of security from these advantages somehow often leads the ship's commander to overconfidence and reckless behavior, ultimately resulting in the ship being beaten into semi-broken mess by enraged pirates and pathers.

The design and tactical application of defensive escort ships led to considerable debate and even physical clashes between supporters of the core design from the Gensoukyou Manufacture Cadets Academy and supporters of the expansion era design. Unable to convince each other due to both side's belief on practical experience, this dispute provided the Gensoukyou Manufacture fleet with a perfect opportunity, as they are in need of a new security ship. Subsequently, the two vibrant but small teams were somehow brought together in a bizarre manner to complete a new project. The result is this bizarre ship that looks like a shuttle but has unparalleled defensive capabilities.

Thanks to some clever tricks and successful confidentiality procedures, the fleet successfully led both sides to believe that they were the only ones being funded, gaining an advantage in the budget plan. Although, during the final system integration, the core era supporters responsible for the ship systems and the expansion era supporters responsible for the ship's body and shield system design discovered the true nature of this opportunistic gambit. However, the miraculously coordinated integration of the two teams quickly made everyone set aside their dissatisfaction with a cheerful "congratulations, congratulations."

Like other Gensoukyou Manufacture ships, it seems to have been affected by some degree of meme contamination.

Needler for Gensoukyou Manufacture, it is a pseudo-needler pulse weapon used for shield suppression that is also equipped an better-than-nothing energy recovery system that serves as a supporting tool for PD suppression.

Also known as the Needle of Faith, it is said to commemorate a legendary hero's weapon.
text3: "Can someone explain what these coloured things are..."

text1:
A suppression missile bay with high ammo capacity and rapid reloading rate, capable of efficiently wiping out the armor of large ships and causing considerable trouble for those ships.

Dissatisfaction with the old anti-armor missiles, combined with the ingenious ideas of several engineers from the inner side of the boundaries, ultimately resulted in such a strange but effective weapon. This remarkably agile missile is not equipped with conventional warheads but instead uses a set of special one-use particle accelerators.

Upon entering the effective range, the pre-loaded high-penetration anti-armor particles will be accelerated in a pre-defined pattern, striking the target's armor from both sides.

Interestingly, although Gensoukyou Manufacture, as the primary user, does not find this missile very efficient, pirates and pathers often find themselves quite annoyed by this little gadget.

A medium-range anti-armor missile launcher, highly efficient against large ships, and has a high ammo capacity for sustained engagement.
Dissatisfaction with the old anti-armor missiles, combined with the ingenious ideas of several engineers from the inner side of the boundaries, ultimately resulted in such a strange but effective weapon. This remarkably agile missile is not equipped with conventional warheads but instead uses a set of special one-use particle accelerators.

Upon entering the effective range, the pre-loaded high-penetration anti-armor particles will be accelerated in a pre-defined pattern, striking the target's armor from both sides.

Interestingly, although Gensoukyou Manufacture, as the primary user, does not find this missile very efficient, pirates and pathers often find themselves quite annoyed by this little gadget.

Despite its strange name and the fact that few of its average user can understand how it operates, this specialized plasma cannon is capable of firing danmaku with limited tracking abilities, its heavy long range firepower largely fills a gap within the sector's conventional weapons.

Many urban legend enthusiasts are eager to study how the spirit summoning seal achieves its guidance ability.However, so far, most explanations have been considered more psuedo-scientific than the official descriptions, making them hard to accept for the wider audience.

Another perplexing long-range support weapon capable of projecting fairly dangerous self-guided energy beams over extreme distances. However, its exorbitant and disproportionate flux cost does discourages potential users.

Although the weapon is functionally similar to conventional blaster weapons in the sector, the the energized plasma has been processed via spiritual energy before release through the weapon's high energy conduit , giving the projectile self-guidance capabilities.

Based on the tracking ability and the weapon's intriguing name, the Desire Accelerator, like many Gensoukyou Manufacture weapons, has its own urban legend.

Literally an electromagnetic longbow, it fires specialized arrow-shaped projectiles using a principle similar to Gauss cannons. This ammunition, integrated with teleportation technology, will teleport energy mines to location of impact and detonate, proving a useful psychological deterrence. However, it still cannot pose sufficient threat to heavily armor target.

Its name may originate from a certain legend on the inner side of the boundary, mainly about the "Moon Peoples" and the "Impurity on the Earth."

The smallest version of the Spark beam weapons, with a larger capacitor and smaller single-shot damage compared to Burst PD Laser, while enhancing the range.

No matter how you look it, it is a rather simple small PD beam, but because it uses a small amount of spirit energy technology to improve the efficiency of the capacitor, it seems to have a mysterious effect of improving the sense of security amongst the ship's crew members when fired.

Even if one does not believe in these effects, its unique firing sound can still provide some soothing effect to fatigued crew members in battle.

A larger heavier burst version of the Spark beam weapon, although it has decent flux efficiency, its capacitor requires a long time to charge, and its anti-armor effectiveness is even lower.

Many people consider this weapon a revolutionary upgrade to the Phase Lance, retaining some single burst damage while gaining a longer range and a more flexible capacitor system.

However, in reality, this comes with a significant compromise in anti-armor effectiveness. Nevertheless, for engagement between various small-sized ships, this is not considered a flaw.

An unparalleled medium-range beam weapon, despite poor flux efficiency, is still a force to be reckoned with as one of the strongest firepower in the sector.

A weapon that relies entirely on its power output to solve everything, just aiming at enemy and fire should produce good results.

This version, specifically built into the Majou-class Destroyer, comes with a special reactor design.

Although it has a longer range, the small Illusion Laser is not as effective an anti-armor weapon as its larger counterparts.

Leaving the turret and optical system design entirely to people from the inner side of the boundaries resulted in a beam is difficult to concentrate its damage. However, due to its excellent energy circuit design, this weapon still entered service.

Even though it cannot concentrate all of its beams, this weapon's output power is much higher than Tactical Laser and Graviton Beam, excelling in countering armor.

An improved product after the Miniature Illusion Laser received multiple complaints, it has a more practical optical system and retains the outstanding energy system of the original.

Like its inner side prototype, it is adept at close-range combat.

This is a standard anti-ship pulse weapon capable of continuously projecting partially ionized energy beams with a relative high rate of fire. However, this ability also leads to the instability in the trajectory and even the body of the emitted beams themselves...

This renowned multi-purpose pulse weapon operates on fairly traditional principles: by using high-frequency pulse laser to destabilize the gaseous-state ammunition, which are then simply launched via an accelerator. However, due to the unconventional nature of the gas ammunition and pulse generator used, the internal components of the energy beam often begin to react with each other over time, leading to the disintegration and splitting of the projectiles. However, as the projectile can still reach, and even exceed, its maximum range and hit its target in actual combat, this peculiar combination actually gives this weapon more possible uses.

An improved pulse weapon designed for medium-range combat, boasting stronger burst firepower. It also launches a mixed energy beam through the coventional methods, with the only issue perhaps being the instability of the charging system.

After further research and analysis of the Icicle Falls's unique characteristics, a brand-new weapon has been developed, finally allowing the energy beams to stop splitting and missing their target in such a foolish display, However, the cost is a significant increase in energy requirements...

An atypical general purpose energy cannon that is quite brutal, known as the "Void Blade". The cannon deriving its name from the phenomenon that causes its projectile to extend near maximum range, which lead to a reduction in anti-armor capabilities.

In many senses, integrating such a huge energy output into a medium-energy weapon is quite unthinkable, but what is even more shocking is its terrifying energy efficiency. However, whether due to the interaction of particles within the energy beam or some other reasons, the projectiles it launches always disintegrate and unfold into a chain of individual secondary projectiles at longer range that will continue to travel forward.

The Fighter mounted version of the Void Blade, with significant differences in firing mode from the conventional version but retaining the powerful shock value against armor at close range.

Although its base model received praise in close combat, its effectiveness when integrated into carrier fighter has always left something to be desired. After receiving a large number of complaints and feedback, it resulted in this peculiar modification.

Despite opinions suggesting that cutting the spirit energy mechanism that allows the generation of the secondary danmaku represented a missed opportunity to improve the weapon's range, this hyper specialized close-range design has proven itself simple and effective.

A peculiar medium-range support... or strike weapon, featuring an unstable active reactor being placed special container and launched, dispersing a large number of self-guided missiles in flight, with extremely high potential destructive power.

On the other hand, theoretically, direct hits on enemy ships can also cause considerable damage, but in practice, its slow flight speed makes this very difficult. Initially designed as the Stardust Projector, its function was to disperse a large number of unguided support danmaku along the flight path as a mean of dealing direct damage. However, with the introduction of larger Yakouchuu, the project shifted to using interceptible but more useful missile-type secondary projectiles, and its name are also changed.

A product of time flow technology further developed by Gensoukyou Manufacture, it launches a physical warhead equipped with a miniature time dilation circuit to allow for Bizarre movement and considerable damage against shielded targets.

Despite employing advanced technology, its fire control system is still as far from perfect, just like most Gensoukyou Manufacture weapons, but there are no major issues in practical use.

A fusion of pulse energy weapons and plasma technology, utilizing outdated anti-missile flare launchers, this highly integrated strike weapon has excellent overall energy efficiency and single-shot destructive power. Perhaps its only flaw is that it can cause significant damage to ship targeting computers. Although the on-paper statistic seems absurd, Gensoukyou Manufacture's traditional skill in supporting their offensive and defensive capability via secondary danmaku through the use of additional energy is well reflected in this weapon. 

At the same time, given useful features like high single shot damage and good flux efficiency, this weapon can be used to great effect even in the hands of fools. However, the prerequisite is that this fool has enough courage to get close to the enemy and launch the weapon because its actual projectiles flight speed is even more pitiful than the Hellbore Cannon.

A maddening long-range suppression weapon capable of projecting a massive number of self-guided projectiles to autonomously strike enemy ships from a considerable distance.While its effectiveness diminishes against relatively heavy armor and shields, with a small amount of specialized support equipments, it can achieve results far beyond expectations.

Originally developed as a point defense weapon for projecting numerous active flares at a distance, it gradually evolved into an offensive weapon with a change in the overall direction of Gensoukyou Manufacture.

A design that places antimatter blaster on an automated targeting platform, which is basically cheating. It is also a two-stage projectile thats similar to an Sabot SRM, provides exceptional breakthrough capability and precision.However, due to its high complexity and not-so-accurate automated targeting equipment, it is not as popular among other users. 

It is renowned in the sector as the signature weapon of the Amanojyaku drone.

The Fighter version mounted on the Amanojyaku drone, with only single ammo but standard firepower.

A design that places antimatter blaster on an automated targeting platform, which is basically cheating. It is also a two-stage projectile thats similar to an Sabot SRM, provides exceptional breakthrough capability and precision.However, due to its high complexity and not-so-accurate automated targeting equipment, it is not as popular among other users. 

It is renowned in the sector as the signature weapon of the Amanojyaku drone.

A straightforward and versatile dual purpose anti-ship and Point Defense (PD) weapon. Compared to the ion pulsar, which served as a basis for this weapon, it retained some disruptive capabilities while significantly improving effectiveness against fighter craft and missiles.

However, in comparison, its anti-ship performance, especially against armor, is akin to trying to cut armor with actual plant leaf.

The Fighter version of Leaf Close-In Weapon System (CIWS), eliminating the clip design and reducing the rate of fire to fit the confined space of drones.

A straightforward and versatile dual purpose anti-ship and Point Defense (PD) weapon. Compared to the ion pulsar, which served as a basis for this weapon, it retained some disruptive capabilities while significantly improving effectiveness against fighter craft and missiles.

However, in comparison, its anti-ship performance, especially against armor, is akin to trying to cut armor with actual plant leaf.

Although many doubt the necessity of such an extreme rate of fire, it is evident that some things are just self-evident. 

As an sort of upgraded version of the Hidden Leaf CIWS, the Fuujin Hidden Leaf completely overturned the weapon's originally general purpsoe role, transforming into a pure suppression weapon. Relying on a complex and precise capacitor array and a new fire control system based on spirt prediction technology, as long as the reactor remains stable, it can produce a storm at an astonishing rate. This whirlwind, carrying an EMP flood, poses a severe test for any type of protection.

Despite being labeled as overly sophisticated, extremely complex, and inefficient, this product that combines suspicious mystical technology with beam weapons to create one of the most terrifying mass-produced anti-missiles / fighters weapon in comprable weapon slots. Only missiles and wings equipped with true armor and sturdy hulls can escape unscathed within the purifier zone created by this weapon. For ships, the tremendous soft flux impact generated by Seventeen Radiance is enough to threaten shield systems. 

By replacing the medium and redesigning the charging system, Gensoukyou Manufacture increased the efficiency of conventional Burst PD lasers to a frightening level at the cost of firing frequency and charging time. However, due to the urgent need for wide-area PD weapons, the weapon ultimately added a modified energy leap system from within the boundaries, used to teleport energy mine to the end point of the weapon's beam, and it is this move that restored the weapon's efficiency to its original level.

A product developed following the idea of "using the smallest size to threaten the largest classes of ships" similar to the common antimatter blaster. It has received widespread praise in practical applications due to unexpected supported capabilities. 

Although all systems of this weapon correspond to energy weapon slots in engineering, fundamentally, it resembles a hybrid of projectile and energy weapons. In terms of launching its projectile, it uses a technology similar to railguns and gauss cannons by directly launching a physical warhead, with ballistic properties. However, on the other hand, in terms of damage, it mainly relies on the enormous energy shockwave generated by the specially manufactured projectiles upon impact with the target. Cccasionally, the hit impact will briefly act like entropy amplifiers. This unique phoenomon is named "the Plague" by Gensoukyou Manufacture, the specific reasons for this unique phenomenon are still unclear.

A single high-yield energy mine that releases spiritual energy shockwaves on impact. It has a larger triggering range and a smaller size compared to general-purpose proximity mines.

Highly praised for its widespread applications, but currently, this practical weapon can only be found on Great fairies. However, there are rumors that efforts are underway to universalize this type of weapon.

More hidden functions may be under development...

Elegant, efficient, precise, deadly she possesses all the advantages, and the cost is an extreme dependence on spiritual charge integrated within Dichromatic Lotus Butterfly System. 
To some extent, this weapon can be considered an extremely specialized built-in version of a Sealing Needle. By integrating the energy charging system using Spiritual Charge and utilizing Inter-Gap cycling system taking up the entire frontal portion of the ship, it allows all flux generated by this weapon to be "consumed." On this basis, a new particle acceleration system and capacitor design ensure the weapon's ability to fire at high intensity and high speed. At the same time, its flaws are also evident.

Without the precisely enginereed Dichromatic Lotus Butterfly System, its massive Spiritual Charge consumption would deplete a spirit vessel with a single shot within a single capcitor's firing cycle, limiting the weapon's use to being an integrated armament of Miko-class.

This slight sense of dissapoint is a reflection of its namesake from the inner-side of the boundaries.

A variant of the PD beam weapon equipped only on Shanghai drones, using a burst attack method to counter various threats from missiles to ships, though the recharing time can sometime lead to missed opportunities.
A burst disruption beam exclusively equipped on Hourai drones. Although the effect is not significant in low quantity, it can achieve a quite powerful disabling effect with sufficient numbers.

A multiple-energy rocket launch system capable of sequentially firing different types of rocket barrages, can cause terrifying destruction in ideal situations.

Fully adopting a disposable energy system allowed this functionally energy-based weapon to fit on a missile slot. However, to save funds and simplify the structure, the prototype weapon's compatibility with energy slots was removed. 

On the other hand, although the powerful loading and energy system allows it to quickly unleash a massive firepower, it should be noted that the weapon's ammo capacity is not outstanding. Its unique ballistic and ordinary targeting system can turn this small shortcoming into a massive disappointment.

A multiple-energy rocket launch system capable of sequentially firing different types of rocket barrages, can cause terrifying destruction in ideal situations.. This version integrated into the White Fairy has a specially designed high reloading speed.

Fully adopting a disposable energy system allowed this functionally energy-based weapon to fit on a missile slot. However, to save funds and simplify the structure, the prototype weapon's compatibility with energy slots was removed. 

On the other hand, although the powerful loading and energy system allows it to quickly unleash a massive firepower, it should be noted that the weapon's ammo capacity is not outstanding.

An bomber drone designed with a generalist approach, with its versatile but non-conventional weapon loadout,it is capable of threatening any type of ship. However, skeptics always question the effectiveness of its shield generator and high-performance engines in tactical combat.

Filled with disdain for the established rules of traditional fleet battle, this nimble and deadly cutting-edge bomber is the most versatile strike unit in Gensoukyou Manufacture. However, the relatively complex structure increases the maintenance difficulty to some extent.

like all other Gensoukyou Manufacture ships, it seems to be affected by some sort of memetic corruption.

Attack Drone specially designed to accompany the Literary-class Destroyer, it can provide medium-range fire support. It is equipped with an Active Flare launcher to counter missiles.

like all other Gensoukyou Manufacture ships, it seems to be affected by some sort of memetic corruption.

A long standing mascot of the fleet, this plain and unassuming drone relies solely on its built-in tactical system and a not-so-effective ion cannon for combat. It can serve as a ceremonial unit if needed.

like all other Gensoukyou Manufacture ships, it seems to be affected by some sort of memetic corruption.

An unshielded attack fighter with a peculiar appearance and bizarre behavior pattern. It is equipped with a universal energy weapon that, due to modification in technology, can only be used in close range. It also obtained dogfighting performance far above its basic parameter would suggest through its tactical systems.

The predecessor of the modern Hinotama was a type of support drone. It was designed to simplify maintenance by removing shields, installing cheap engines, and thickening armor as alternatives protection, thus controlling costs.

However, the soaring cost arising out of the series of experiments and the engineering team's misguided experimental approach ultimately led to the failure of the development of this support fighter. In the spirit of fully utilizing resources, the failed support aircraft prototype eventually became a testing platform for another new tactical system.

This new system, incorporating time-dilation technology for enhanced maneuverability, was found to generate a series of bizarre physical phenomena along the trajectory of the drone, causing significant damage to surrounding entities. Therefore, the prototype was further equipped with thicker armor and replaced its long-range weapons with a more destructive close-range version of the Void Blade, resulting in this bizarre attack drones.

like all other Gensoukyou Manufacture ships, it seems to be affected by some sort of memetic corruption.

A heavy interceptor sacrificing maneuverability to install shields and beam weapons with a longer range than other interceptors, having a significant advantage in countering small units but not useful for escort missions.

Although fragile, it is still widely used as the basic type of the Fairy series.

like all other Gensoukyou Manufacture ships, it seems to be affected by some sort of memetic corruption.

Improved from the Standard Fairy, it has advanced shields and better anti-ship weapons, along with the ability to independently create an area-denial danmaku.

Despite its powerful firepower and versitility, it remains quite fragile under heavy firepower.

like all other Gensoukyou Manufacture ships, it seems to be affected by some sort of memetic corruption.

A Fairy variant designed for rapid strikes, enhancing maneuverability while minimizing its impact on overall structural strength and shield systems. It can easily approach enemy ships to launch a energy mine that at least appears powerful on paper.

Although the single shot payload is low, with enough quantity, it can create an area denial effect. Its additional light flare system can interfere with the enemy in many ways. However, it should be noted that high intensity combat will still post considerable threat for this craft's hull.

like all other Gensoukyou Manufacture ships, it seems to be affected by some sort of memetic corruption.

A suppression bomber designed to deploy large amount of rockets at mid range, this bomber retains its prototype's frontal shield but becomes relatively slow due to increased mass.

It can unleash a whole set of general-purpose rockets in a short period, almost guaranteeing hits on less maneuverable enemy ships. However, its lengthy rearmament cycle and the insufficient single-shot destructive power of rocket barrages still make it difficult to threaten ships with real point defence.

like all other Gensoukyou Manufacture ships, it seems to be affected by some sort of memetic corruption.

A unique, relatively inexpensive but nevertheless threatening interceptor, equipped with a burst PD beam weapon and an unique integrated sacrificial protocol system.

It is also the basic model of the fighter drone series known as 'dolls.'

like all other Gensoukyou Manufacture ships, it seems to be affected by some sort of memetic corruption.

A specialized support drone derived from the Shanghai drones. This relatively resilient support aircraft can cause devastating damage to ship subsystems if given the opportunity. However, various compromises had to be made to allow the mounting of the disruption weapon, which limit the craft's performance.
Similar to Shanghai, it adopts a unique self-destruct tactical system, but unlike Shanghai, its tactical system leans more towards long-range incapacitation.

like all other Gensoukyou Manufacture ships, it seems to be affected by some sort of memetic corruption.
Relying on a miniature spell field, the Speed and Manueverability of Wings is increased. it also increase the damage dealt by fighter's missile but reduce damage of other fighter weapons.
Temporarily enter phase mode and move rapidly forward, but cannot deal damage.
Built into the Tamashi class, when activated, increase damage and reduce weapon flux usage, the system's only downside is that it does not help with mobility.
Reduce targetted enemy ship's PD range, it is said that it will also cause psycological damage to enemy with mystical tech.
Launch several Mochi Class guided mines in the target area, deals massive damage to lightly armored targets.
Generate special spell field to strengthen friendly targets, but increase damage taken by this ship.
This advanced boundary control device will teleport enemy ship and fighter within an area far away from this ship, does not affect projectiles.
Cross the boundary to appear in another location, more flexible than conventional phase skimmer.
text3: Skip through the boundry to appear in another location. If activated with only 1 remaining charge, will not cost a charge but will cost 20% energy from Spiritual Charge, if there are insufficent energy, it cannot be used.

text1: Increase energy weapon damage and range, in exchange all non-large weapon are disable and mobility is reduced.

Mysterious but powerful defense system, able to divert incoming non-missile projectiles away from this ship while unleashing a massive danmaku towards the ship's surroundings, perhaps it is really a miracle?
Gensoukyou version of burn drive, massively increase ship mass as well as accelerating the ship, but also lasts for a shorter duration.
Overload engine for a shortime to increase mobility and speed, good for assault.

A special code implemented within the dolls, it will forcefully activate when hull integrity is below 50%.It will target the closest enemy target before overloading the reactor to create a small area HE explosion.
A special code implemented within the dolls, it will forcefully activate when hull integrity is below 50%.It will target the closest enemy target before exploding causing some Energy and EMP damage.
An impressive specialized phase space techonology, will send non-bomber fighters wings through the boundary next to the target ship.

Unlike normal phase skimmers, this system has accurate targeting and will teleport the ship to directly behind the target. A red shade will be left at the ship's original location, the ship will return to the shade's location when shipsystem end.
Using a brutally direct seal generator, create large amount of crystal pulse projectiles and high energy beam, causing direct damage to enemy ships.
A launch system once used for artistic expression, now used to fire HE shells that are quite damaging for small weapons to support the carrier.
As it says on the tin, overload ship reactor to considerably increase energy weapon damage, lasts longer than high energy focus but could disable weapon for a short period on activation.
Launch a powerful defensive drone to cover the ship's rear and provide missile support.
Create a sort of mystical connection between target and this ship, massively reduce the target mobility and speed, generate large amount of flux, and cause the target to be unable to vent hard flux.
Cause an anti-missile mystical explosion, shutting down all missile engine in the area.
Temporarily Overload the Auxiliary Booster to gain instant speed boost and turning rate for short duration of times.
A Bizarre version of the mine teleporter, will teleport multiple EMP Fragment Rocket next to the enemy ship to strike. Worth noting that this system does not use any sort of time dilation technology.
text3: Generate 1000 flux and create 14 rocket that can potentially pierce shield around the target, each dealing 150 frag damage and 150 EMP Damage

text1: A highly caliberated phase system based through Spell Framework. Besides the usual phase effect, this system has a deeper connection with the ship's unique systems.
text3: Enter phase space and consume enemy missile and projectile near the ship, the consumed projectiles and missile will charge up the Spiritual Charge.

text1: Special mid range weapon, it does not have its own fire control but is controlled directly by the commander like other ship systems. The Strange energy beam fired is thought to be a manifestation of spiritual energy.
text3: Consume Spiritual Charge energy to shoot danmaku infront of the ship, the damage depend on hard flux, with a base of 100 energy damage, but can increase to 1000% based on hard flux, Upon hitting enemy shield, restore this ship's hull based on damage dealt. When firing, the ship takes 50% less hull and armor damage.

text1: Launch an active decoy to disrupt missile and PD.
Dash forward and cause damage over time to enemgy target on the trail created.
text3: Charge, and deal 400 Energy Damage to enemy ships in the path every 0.1s as well as causing equal amount of emp

text1: Massively Increase Soft and Hard Flux Dissipations and Reduce enemy Fighter Speed in suroundings.

After a charge up period, create a missile or heat decoy danmaku at a fighter wing's location, and provide the fighter wing with a forward or backward momentum. The exact effect depends on if the fighter wing are bombers or not.
Fire multiple special decoy that split into multiple active decoys after a while.

An Earth-like planet with a perfect climate, planned and established as an important research and agricultural world during the Domain-era, and currently the capital of Gensoukyou Manufacture.
Despite the confusion of the Collapse, under the administration of Gensoukyou Manufacture, there are still a few advanced research facilities and a huge amount of information from the Domain-era left. At the same time, the local education and tourism industries are also booming.
What is noteworthy is that despite the fact there is a wide spread rumor that "on this planet exists a realm of the ordinary and an realm of the extraordinary" and "monsters live there" are widely spread in the outside world, Gensoukyou Manufacture Officials and local people seem to be indifferent about it all.
text3:
The enviroment of Hakurei can be described as a blend of past and future. The vast Urban Cities their satellite cities dedicated towards research and education, the massive industral farms outside the city that provide food for the entire planets, the multi-purpose manufacture and assembly plant that spread out over the planet's ocean, and the large Space Ports in the orbit, everything exudes a nostalgic sense of futurism.

At the same time, there are still plenty of natural and preserved habitats throughout the landscapes. Scattered throughout the vast regions of nature are the remnants of the Domain-era ruins, and rural settlements that reflect the deep history and culture of the planet. This dream-like condition makes it hard for people to believe that a sight like this could befound in the Persean Sector.

text1:
The Burning Hells holds tremendous resources and was an unknown planet before the Collapse, but after the Gensoukyou Manufacture successfully colonized the [Hakurei], the planet grew into a major mining centre.
Now that the starsystem is under new threat, this volcanic planet is rapidly becoming highly militarised to help defend the star system.
text3: The high temperatures and toxic atmospheres that are so hazardous to outsiders are in another sense a great advantage to the defence of the planetary garrison. Above the river of lava hovered a vast number of mining units, hidden by fortified outpost platforms. Large arrays of anti-ship weaponry are concealed amongst strong, heat-resistant surface fortifications, controlled directly from a command centre located deep within the stable zone.

text1:
At the end of the Second AI War, a group of wandering Luddic occupied this small, barren planet at the time of the appearance of Gensoukyou Manufacture. However, as friction between the Gensoukyou Manufacture and the Luddic escalated, the planet became a raiding staging point of Luddic Pathers with the tacit approval of the Church.
The Gensoukyou Manufacture planned to forcibly cleanse the planet, but that operation was eventually terminated when the Knights of Ludds intervened.
text3:
A strong will can sometimes make harsh circumstances all but insignificant. Thanks to the support of a handful of radicals within the Church and the tenacity of pather group, the planet has an unimaginable level of militarisation. From the vast array of minefields in orbit to the clusters of hidden artillery arrays and bunkers on the planet's surface, the atmosphere of a unbreakable fortress is exuded.

Nevertheless a small-scale of mining and production still exist to sustain life here.

text1:
Prior to the Collapse, the gas giant Kirisame was not an important planet, despite its rich reserves of volatiles.
However, as the overall industrial level of the planet declined after the Collapse, its exploitation was put on the to do list, and after the establishment of a small fuel plant, its status in the Gensokyo system gradually increased!
text3: Floating in the atmosphere are platforms with centralised resource harvesting and processing facilities, where raw materials from both local and outside sources are processed into processed products for the system industrial hub. The relative ease of control and the nature of the gas giants as waypoints have had a subtle effect on the number of captains and traders from outside the System.

text1: Hakurei  Gensokyo
A small, icy planet that on the surface appears to be very, very, very worthless, but underneath its sea of ice may lie some unspeakable secrets.

Faction that appeared suddenly with the Gensoukyou System sometime after the end of Second AI War, claiming to be a Techmining Corporation with general industry capabilities (from food and light industry to the production of ships) . It seems to have a strange obsession with "Spiritual Energy" and "Boundary", which can found all over their product promotions and descriptions.

In fact, like their promotions, the company is quite enthusiastic about discovering the technology of Domain-era, and even has a basic research facility that is rare in the current persean sector. As a result, even though they are not as large as Tri-Tachyon in terms of the size of their "Corporate Business", they are often able to produce large-scale, cutting-edge products that are beyond common belief. Recently, they are trying to promote some new products to the outside world, which are said to incorporate technology that use "Spiritual Energy".

But in its essence, Gensoukyou Manufacture is not your typical mega-corporation. This faction, which originated from the rising R&D world "Hakurei" in Domain-era, is "practically" governed by an executive council of scholars from all walks of life (mainly Natural Sciences and Applied Technologies, as well as Spiritual Energy researchers...) The civilian governments of each planet are relatively united together behind the executive board. 

In addition, there are some Bizarre legends that suggest that Gensoukyou is actually a front for an even more mysterious world, a paradise for all sorts of Bizarre beings such as Youkai and Deities. But until now, most researchers outside of the Gensoukyou system have either paid little attention to this, or simply dismissed it as rumours made up for the purpose of marketing Spiritual Products.

Regardless, this Neutral Faction with almost Magical Science and Technology in hand, as well as a respectable number of space military forces, is bound to have an even more subtle influence on the delicate balance of power in this sector.....
